description.en:
Misiryeong — a hill turned to hell.  
Raise your arrows to survive.

title.en: "Sainou no Utsuwa" de Mezasu Meikyuu Saishinbu – Skill Yoko Nobashi no Hazu ga, Bannou Cheat datta!

altTitles.ja-ro: 「才能の器」で目指す迷宮最深部 スキル横伸ばしのはずが、万能チートだった！

altTitles.en: Aiming for the Deepest Part of the Labyrinth Thanks to "The Vessel of Talent": What was Supposed to be a Normal Progression of Skills Turned Out to be an All-Purpose Cheat!

description.en: Ryo is suddenly transferred to another world and is given the "Vessel of Talent," an ability that grants him the choice to level any skill he wants. Armed with the strongest growth cheat, he sets out to explore the labyrinth to find out why he was transferred there!
description.ja: 突然異世界へと転移させられたリョウは、どんなスキルでも手に入れられる能力「才能の器」を与えられる。最強成長チートを武器に、自分がここへ転移させられた理由を知るため、迷宮探索へと向かう！

title.en: Eiyuu Blanc no Jinsei Keikaku Dai Ni no Jinsei wa Akogare no Zatsuyougakari de Onegaishimasu

altTitles.ja: 英雄ブランの人生計画 第二の人生は雑用係でお願いします

altTitles.en: The Former Strongest Hero Lives as a Side Character

description.en:
Blanc, the most powerful Grade-0 Adventurer, known across the world as the Black Emperor. After slaying the Black Dragon that plunged the world into despair, he became a legendary hero.

And then, he made a shocking declaration: “I’m retiring from being a Grade-0 Adventurer.”

Now walking a new path, Blanc—once hailed as the strongest—takes on humble odd jobs as he begins a quiet journey of self-discovery. From Miku, the creator of “The Fruit of Evolution”, comes a bold new fantasy brought to life on an epic scale!

title.en: Tsuihou Sarenakatta Otoko: Nidome no Jinsei wa Dogeza kara Hajimarimashita

altTitles.en: The Man Who Wasn't Banished My Second Life Began with Groveling

altTitles.ja: 追放されなかった男　～二度目の人生は土下座から始まりました～

description.en: A mere villager, Cross Vish, somehow ended up joining the hero's party by some strange twist of fate. Cross, an ordinary man with no special powers whatsoever. Yet, for some reason, the heroes genuinely considered Cross a true comrade. There was no way he would ever be banished from the party. And that was precisely why Cross kept agonizing. What could a useless person like him possibly contribute to the hero's party? And then... Cross came to understand his role. At the very moment when the Demon King, on the verge of death, unleashed magic toward the hero—.
description.pt-br:
Um mero aldeão, Cross Vish, de alguma forma acabou se juntando à festa do herói por uma estranha reviravolta do destino. Cross, um homem comum sem poderes especiais. No entanto, por algum motivo, os heróis realmente consideraram cruzar um verdadeiro camarada. Não havia como ele ser banido da festa. E foi exatamente por isso que Cross continuou agonizando.
O que uma pessoa inútil como ele poderia contribuir para a festa do herói? E então ... Cross veio a entender seu papel. No exato momento em que o rei demônio, à beira da morte, desencadeou magia em direção ao herói -.

description.en: In recent years, the world of women's professional wrestling has grown rapidly. A "dojo challenger" has arrived at a women's pro wrestling organization that once took the world by storm! And the one who will face her is... a certain trainee from within the organization? A new women's professional wrestling story brought to life by the team of Sandrovich Yabako, author of the Kengan series, which has sold over 10 million copies, and Doi Nau, a rising star in the world of battle manga!!!
description.pt-br: Nos últimos anos, o mundo da luta livre profissional feminina tem crescido rapidamente. Uma "desafiadora de dojo" chegou a uma organização de wrestling profissional feminino que em tempos tomou o mundo de surpresa! Quem o vai enfrentar é uma certa aprendiz que pertence à organização...? Uma nova história de wrestling profissional feminino desenhada pela equipa de Sandrovich Yabako, autor da série "Kengan", que vendeu mais de IO milhões de exemplares, e Doi Nau, uma estrela em ascensão no mundo da manga de batalha!!!

description.en: In recent years, the world of women's professional wrestling has grown rapidly. A "dojo challenger" has arrived at a women's pro wrestling organization that once took the world by storm! And the one who will face her is... a certain trainee from within the organization? A new women's professional wrestling story brought to life by the team of Sandrovich Yabako, author of the Kengan series, which has sold over 10 million copies, and Doi Nau, a rising star in the world of battle manga!!!
description.pt-br: Nos últimos anos, o mundo da luta livre profissional feminina tem crescido rapidamente. Uma "desafiadora de dojo" chegou a uma organização de wrestling profissional feminino que em tempos tomou o mundo de surpresa! Quem o vai enfrentar é uma certa aprendiz que pertence à organização...? Uma nova história de wrestling profissional feminino desenhada pela equipa de Sandrovich Yabako, autor da série "Kengan", que vendeu mais de IO milhões de exemplares, e Doi Nau, uma estrela em ascensão no mundo da manga de batalha!!!

description.en: Travelers come to a village in search of fairies.

Baekya is childhood friends with Jichan, a well-known trash magnet. It has been and always will be Baekya's job to console Jichan after every one of his bad break-ups. One day, as Baekya was consoling Jichan yet again, the most popular boy in school, Lee Hyeon, appears in front of them. Knowing Hyeon's infamous streak of break-ups and bad boy stories, Baekya tries to stop Sichuan from falling for Hyeon when Jichan falls for him head over heels. Jichan even boldly asks Baekya to become friends with Hyeon just so he could set them up with each other. Baekya begrudgingly accepts and tries his best to become close to Hyeon, when one day Hyeon approaches him first and asks "Don't you think you're making it too obvious? I know you like me, but think you can stop it now?"

**Original Webtoon:** [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/involuntary_romance), [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/detail/involuntary_romance_)

**Official Translations:** [English](https://www.lezhinus.com/en/comic/involuntary), [Japanese](https://www.beltoon.jp/detail/involuntary_romance)

“If it’s okay with you... Would you like to join the Occult Club with me?”

Anna, a gloomy and introverted high school student who has a bunch of fears, has a one-sided crush on Jungwoo. For someone who is the complete opposite of Anna and is bright and friendly, she wouldn’t think twice about becoming friends with him… Not until she finds out Jungwoo is obsessed with occultism?!
The first in the series of manga following the mysterious fire wielding demon slayer known as Tsunami Tougen.

To pursue her dream of becoming a voice actress, Hoshino Hibiki tries to join her high school's manga club, which has produced a number of legendary mangaka. But when she opens a manga she finds in the club room, she suddenly finds herself... in another world!? A double life of traversing between reality and fantasy begins!

After school, we become adventurers!

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** 村岡ユウ

[Oshimi Shuuzou](https://mangadex.org/author/ac27ae52-3ed1-4784-9885-f2985b6a602f) was once his assistant.

**Additional Sites:**
- [Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/yuu.muraoka.9/)

title.en: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?

altTitles.ja: え、社内システム全てワンオペしている私を解雇ですか？（コミック）

altTitles.ja-ro: E, Shanai System Subete OneOpe shiteiru Watashi o Kaiko Desu ka?

altTitles.en: Eh, Are You Seriously Going to Fire Me When I've been Handling the Company's In-House System as a One-Man Show?

description.en: Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons.
description.ja: 社内システムをワンオペしていた佐藤愛は、社長交代を機に解雇予告を受ける。退職後、ファミレスでひとり悲しみに暮れていた愛は、幼馴染の鈴木健太と再会する。そして健太は彼女を自らのスタートアップに招待した。相手の心に寄り添うために始めた事業、その名は「真のプログラマ塾」。佐藤愛の熱く、時に破天荒な講義で受講生たちは少しだけ前を向く。

description.en:
In December of 1970 Takemiya published a short story, "In the Sunroom" (in Bessatsu Shojo Komikku) which is possibly the first shonen-ai manga published and contains the earliest known male-male kiss in shōjo manga.  
  
The manga volume consists of five shorter stories:  
  
- Sunroom Nite (In the Sunroom, 1970)  
- Hohoemu Shounen (The Laughing Boy, 1972)  
- 20 no Hiru to Yoru (20 Days and 20 Nights, 1973)  
- Star! (1974)  
- Mister no Kotori (The Mr.'s Baby Bird, 1975) 
  
Source: [MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series.html?id=53054)

description.ar: تدور الأحداث في إنجلترا خلال العصر الفيكتوري، حيث ننتبّع البروفيسور “جيمس موريارتي” خصم المُحقق الشهير “شيرلوك هولمز “، وذلك خلال نقطة فاصلة من حياة الأول حينما تم تبنّيه هوَ وشقيقه الأصغر “وليام مورياتي” من قِبَل عائلة من النبلاء وذلك بفضل ذكاء وحنكة “جيمس”، إلاّ أنه وأخوه يقرّران التخلّص من الطبقة الحاكمة في إنجلترا وكسر كل القوانين مما يجعلهما ينزلقان إلى الحياة الإجراميّة، وكذلك يضعهما في مفترق طُرق مع “شيرلوك” خلال تحقيقاته، في هذا السلسلة سوف يُعاد رواية سلسلة كُتب شيرلوك هولمز الكلاسيكيّة من وجهة نظر “موريارتي” هذه المرة!
description.en: In the late 19th century, Great Britain rules over a quarter of the world. Nobles sit in their fancy homes in comfort and luxury, while the working class slaves away at their jobs. When young Albert James Moriarty's upper-class family adopts two lower-class orphans, the cruelty the boys experience at his family's hands cements Albert's hatred of the nobility he was born into. He asks the older of the two boys—who has a genius mind and a killer instinct—to help him rid the world of evil, starting with Albert's own family!
description.ja: 時は19世紀末、大英帝国最盛期のロンドン──。　この国に根付く階級制度に辟易するモリアーティ伯爵家長子・アルバート。孤児院から引き取ったある兄弟との出会いによって、世界を浄化するための壮大な計画が動き出す。
description.ru:
Конец позапрошлого века, Британская империя правит миром, и в основе всего лежит классовая система. И тут внезапно появляется Джеймс Мориарти - молодой человек, желающий уничтожить зло, проистекающее из классовой дискриминации, и создать идеальную страну.  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Kana](https://www.kana.fr/produit/moriarty)
description.pt-br: A história de Sherlock Holmes, reimaginada com Moriarty como protagonista e explorando sua motivação para se tornar o maior criminoso que a Grã-Bretanha já viu.

description.en:
Pauline became a mother figure to Rowan, who had lost everything.
After Pauline left, Rowan grieved her and awakened to a power called 'Mana'.
What's more, Rowan could even see the Mana of other people!
Through mana, even though he's apart from Pauline, he can always feel like she's with him...
One day, Rowan encounters a shocking sight of Pauline, who he believed had left for a noble family.

Sato Tatsuhiro is a drug-addled "hikikomori" (a Japanese shut-in) who thinks a sinister organization, NHK (Nihon Hikikomori Kyoukai), is the cause of all his problems! He falls in love with a girl, Misaki, who he thinks is trying to assassinate him, but doesn't know how to talk to her or if he can trust her. The more he stays in his house watching anime porn, reading manga, and doing drugs, the harder it is for him to leave. Only Misaki can keep him from rotting away in his own apartment!
description.ru: Заговоры. Повсюду. Nippon Hikikomori Kyokai. Добро пожаловать в Одиночество. Добро пожаловать в Ряды Отвергнутых Обществом. Ты — хикикомори, и твоя жизнь ничтожна. Если, конечно, вдруг не появится девушка под солнечным зонтиком и не скажет, что спасёт тебя… Непревзойдённая манга, раскрывающая множество проблем современного японского общества. Колкая, жёсткая, необычайно живая, она заставляет задуматься о таких вещах, как удача, судьба, положение в обществе и, конечно же, жизнь в самом широком понимании смысла этого слова.
description.uk: Безробітний двадцятидворічний Сато Тацухіро рідко залишає свою квартиру. Він хікікоморі – відлюдькуватий соціофоб. І невідомо скільки б це тривало, якби одного дня у його двері не постукала дивачка на ім'я Місакі. Постійно згадуючи про якийсь проект, вони обіцяє повернути Сато до світу нормальних людей.
description.pt-br:
Tatsuhiro Satou tem 22 anos e é um hikikomori — alguém que se isolou completamente da sociedade. Convencido de que está sendo manipulado por uma conspiração da "N.H.K." (Nihon Hikikomori Kyokai), ele vive entre paranoias, arrependimentos e delírios. Mas sua rotina muda quando conhece Misaki, uma garota misteriosa que diz poder ajudá-lo a mudar de vida.

Um mangá que mistura humor sombrio, crítica social e uma visão crua sobre depressão, vício e solidão.

description.en:
During a trip, Eun-ha meets a mysterious boy named Sang-ho, chased by a man She grabs Sang-ho and runs away, but a month later, the boy dies. Eunha returns to Korea as if to run away, and 17 years later, a man resembling Sang-ho appears before her. The man introduces himself as Shin Noel, but he reminds her of Sang-ho. Isn't he really the boy from the past? 

Remember me, the story of finding you even in distorted memories.
description.ko:
여행을 떠난 은하는 그곳에서 괴한에게 쫓기던 의문의 소년 산호를 만난다.
간신히 산호를 데리고 도망쳤지만, 한 달 뒤 산호는 은하의 앞에서 사망하게 된다.
이에 은하는 도망치듯 한국으로 돌아가고 17년 뒤, 죽었던 산호와 닮은 남자가 은하의 앞에 나타난다.
그 남자는 자신을 신노엘이라고 소개하지만 너무 많은 부분에서 산호와 겹쳐 보인다.
그는 정말 산호가 아닌걸까? 아니면 산호일까.
일그러진 기억속에서도 당신을 찾아가는 이야기, 나를 기억해줘.

description.en: On September 26, 1954, the Toya Maru, a ferry connecting the Tsugaru Straits between Aomori, the northern tip of Honshu, and Hokkaido, was sucked into the dark sea, taking with it the lives of 1,504 passengers and crew. Ten years later, Taki Tetsuya, one of the surviving family members, studied hard and joined the construction of the Seikan Tunnel, determined not to let his father's death be in vain. Tetsuya worked passionately on the tunnel construction, but one day, in a fit of rage, he killed the president of a trading company who had driven his younger brother to his death in a hit-and-run, and became a fugitive...! This is a hard-boiled story about the life of Taki Tetsuya, a tragic young man who evades the police and pushes forward towards the completion of the Seikan Tunnel!

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/s?k=逃亡海峡+(マンガの金字塔)&i=digital-text&crid=2ISXXNV19EX1&sprefix=逃亡海峡+マンガの金字塔+,digital-text,210&ref=nb_sb_noss

title.en: Tragedy of a Planet ~Hiroshima, the Records of Atomic Bomb Victims~

altTitles.ja: ある惑星の悲劇～ヒロシマ被爆者の記録～

altTitles.en: Tragedy of a Certain Planet: Records of Hiroshima Atomic Bomb Victims

altTitles.ja-ro: Aru Wakusei no Higeki ~Hiroshima Hibakusha no Kiroku~

description.en: On the morning of the fateful day, August 6, 1945, the sky over Hiroshima was high and the sun was shining as usual. Then, at 8:15, while no air raid sirens were sounding, the engine sound of a B29 bomber could be heard for some reason. "When the atomic bomb was dropped on Hiroshima, I was only 900 meters from the hypocenter, and a moment after the explosion I was in the middle of the mushroom cloud." This book contains a comic that depicts the tragedy of the atomic bomb based on the testimony of a survivor.
description.ja: 昭和20年８月６日、運命の日の朝、広島の空はぬけるように高く、太陽はいつものように照りつけていた。そして、８時15分……、空襲警報のサイレンが鳴っていないなか、なぜかＢ29爆撃機のエンジン音が聞こえ……。「わたしは広島に原爆が投下されたとき爆心からわずか900メートルのところにおり、爆発のいっしゅん後にはきのこ雲のどまん中だった」。被爆者の証言をもとに原爆の悲劇を描いた漫画を収録。

links.amz: https://www.amazon.co.jp/ある惑星の悲劇～ヒロシマ被爆者の記録～-草河達夫-ebook/dp/B07YYY4NZQ

title.en: Ultra Q: All Monsters Big Decisive Battle: Monster Islands

altTitles.ja: ウルトラQ全怪獣大決戦怪獣列島

altTitles.ja-ro: Ultra Q: Zen Kaijuu Dai Kessen: Kaijuu Rettou
